title: Trump running low on options in Venezuela military standoff with Maduro
description: Experts say President Donald Trump's standoff with Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro leaves few tools beyond military action to force regime change.
content:
Absent direct military action, President Donald Trump is running low on options amid his standoff with Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro, according to experts.
Strikes near Venezuelan waters aimed at drug traffickers, sanctions and a $50 million bo... [10343 chars]

title: Venezuela’s Maduro confirms call with Trump, welcoming dialogue amid military escalation
description: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro confirmed Wednesday that he spoke by phone with his US counterpart Donald Trump around 10 days ago. The call was initiated by the
content:
Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro confirmed Wednesday that he spoke by phone with his US counterpart Donald Trump around 10 days ago.
The call was initiated by the White House and conducted "in a tone of respect," Maduro said during an event broadc... [1727 chars]

title: Panama's Copa suspends flights to Venezuela, citing signal problem
description:
Panamanian carrier Copa Airlines has suspended Thursday and Friday flights to and from Venezuela's capital Caracas, citing a navigation signal issue reported by its pilots.
• The carrier is evaluating the situation and said it would provide new information within 24 hours. CONTEXT • International airlines had suspended flights to the country following a warning from the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration about a "potentially hazardous situation" when flying over Venezuela.
content: Panamanian carrier Copa Airlines has suspended Thursday and Friday flights to and from Venezuela's capital Caracas, citing a navigation signal issue reported by its pilots. The issue did not compromise flight safety, the company added in a statement ... [754 chars]

content:
Airlines have canceled flights to and from Venezuela’s Maiquetia Simon Bolivar international airport amid warnings from the United States, which has deployed a mighty naval force off the Caribbean coast.

title: US Issues Travel Warning for Venezuela: What to Know
description: Several Western countries have warned their citizens not to travel to Venezuela.
content: The U.S. Department of State on Wednesday warned Americans against traveling to Venezuela, maintaining a Level 4—“Do Not Travel”—advisory first issued in May amid rising tensions over the U.S.'s anti-drug trafficking campaign and pressure on the gove... [498 chars]

title: Wingo y Copa Airlines se unen a la aerolíneas que suspenden vuelos a Venezuela por alerta de seguridad en el Caribe y fallas en señales de navegación
description: El ministro de Interior de Venezuela, Diosdado Cabello, dijo que, pese a la alerta, se han registrado 1.474 vuelos locales e internacionales.
content: Las aerolíneas panameñas Copa Airlines y Wingo suspendieron el miércoles vuelos hacia y desde Venezuela por dos días, al igual que otras ocho compañías internacionales que cancelaron vuelos ante una alerta de la autoridad aeronáutica estadounidense p... [2932 chars]

title: El radar instalado por EE. UU. en Trinidad y Tobago busca frenar petróleo sancionado y narcotráfico desde Venezuela, según primera ministra
description: Caracas acusa a Persad-Bissessar de sumarse a los planes de Estados Unidos para derrocar al gobierno de Nicolás Maduro.

title: El despliegue militar de Estados Unidos frente a Venezuela, ¿a las puertas de una intervención militar contra Maduro?
description: Washington eleva la presión con más buques y unidades aéreas, mientras evalúa qué opciones militares mantiene abiertas.
content: El despliegue naval y aéreo de Estados Unidos frente a Venezuela ha alcanzado una magnitud inédita desde la crisis de los misiles en Cuba en 1962. El Pentágono ha situado en el Caribe un grupo de combate completo con el portaaviones USS George Washin... [3176 chars]

title: Meet the US’s drug running friends: A history of narcotics involvement
description: Trump claims to be cracking down on drug gangs in Venezuela but pardoned a Honduran drug lord serving time in the US.

title: Hegseth under pressure as admiral blamed for ‘war crime’ boat strike to be grilled by Congress: Live
description: Admiral Frank ‘Mitch’ Bradley is set to give a classified briefing to lawmakers over the lethal Venezuela ‘drug boat’ strikes
content:
The U.S. Navy admiral blamed by the White House for a second lethal strike on an alleged Venezuelan drug boat is set to be grilled by lawmakers Thursday, ratcheting up the pressure on Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth’s handling of the operation.

title: What are Trump's motivations in Venezuela?
description: Trump’s goal is obvious, but another question springs to the surface: What is the motivation for Trump’s decision-making?
content:
I’ve been trying over the last two months to figure out what’s driving Trump’s stance toward Venezuela. None of the explanations provided by the administration is especially convincing to me.

title: EXPLAINER-Did the US military commit a war crime in boat attack off Venezuela?
description: Members of Congress have said they will investigate whether the U.S. military broke the law by allegedly killing two survivors of a strike on a suspected drug trafficking vessel in the Caribbean.
content: Members of Congress have said they will investigate whether the U.S. military broke the law by allegedly killing two survivors of a strike on a suspected drug trafficking vessel in the Caribbean. The White House has defended the strike as lawful. Bel... [6533 chars]

title: Tensión con Venezuela: el Pentágono sabía que el ataque a una lancha narco dejó sobrevivientes, aún así lanzó un segundo bombardeo
description: Lo que sigue sin estar claro es quién ordenó los ataques y si el secretario de Defensa Pete Hegseth estuvo involucrado.Este jueves el Congreso interrogará al almirante a cargo del operativo, en una sesión a puertas cerradas.
content: El Pentágono sabía que había sobrevivientes tras lanzar un ataque en septiembre contra una embarcación que presuntamente transportaba drogas por el mar Caribe, y aun así, el Ejército estadounidense lanzó una segunda ofensiva de seguimiento, según dos... [3990 chars]

title: ‘Cartel de los Soles’, ‘Tren de Aragua’, Farc y las claves de la carta del ‘Pollo’ Carvajal al presidente Donald Trump
description: Según su versión, 'el régimen ha proporcionado armas, pasaportes e impunidad a estas organizaciones' para facilitar operaciones desde Venezuela.
